data.title: University of Trás-os-Montes and Alto Douro, Portugal
data.meta_description: This page is meant to showcase research output of "University of Trás-os-Montes and Alto Douro" published in IBIMA International Conferences proceedings. IBIMA Conference Proceedings are indexed by Web of Sciences since 2006 and SCOPUS since 2005.
data.text:
Mohammad Gulam LORGAT and Hugo PAREDES, “Handling Non-Functional Requirements in Software Architecture,” Proceedings of the 37th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9998551-6-4, 30-31 May 2021, Cordoba, Spain, p 3674-3678.

Dilma MORAIS and João P. SOUSA, “Orchestration of Cloud-Based Services and Infrastructure: An Exploratory Analysis of Juju, Kubernetes, and Terraform,” Proceedings of the 37th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9998551-6-4, 30-31 May 2021, Cordoba, Spain, p 6504-6510.

Maria I. B. RIBEIRO, Isabel M. LOPES, António J. G. FERNANDES and Francisco J. L. S. DINIZ, “Impact of Worker Motivation and Work Environment on Job Happiness: Case Study of An Organization That Develops Social Support Activities” Proceedings of the 34th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9998551-3-3, 13-14 November 2019, Madrid, Spain, p. 178-187.

Maria I. B. RIBEIRO, Isabel M. LOPES, António J. G. FERNANDES and Francisco J. L. S. DINIZ, “Entrepreneurial Self-Efficacy in Portugal: A Cross-Sectional Study in Higher Education Students” Proceedings of the 34th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9998551-3-3, 13-14 November 2019, Madrid, Spain, p. 11-23.

Maria José Palma Lampreia DOS-SANTOS, Maria Fátima FERREIRO, Carlos MACHADO-SANTOS, Rizwan RAHEEM AHMED, Emiliana SILVA and Nawaz AHMAD, “Analyse De La Durabilité Des Entreprises Agricoles Européennes,” Proceedings of the 33rd International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9998551-2-6, 10-11 April 2019, Granada, Spain, p 555-567.

Frederico Branco, José Martins, Ramiro Gonçalves and José Alves, “Amplified Sensing System to Support Decision – A Proposal for an Extension to a Mushroom Farm Process Control System,” Proceedings of the 25th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9860419-4-5, 7-8 May 2015, Amsterdam, Netherlands, p. 2020-2030.

Pedro Sá Silva, António Trigo, Sérgio Quintaneiro, and João Varajão, “Enterprise Simulation: a case study,” Proceedings of the 17th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-6-9, 14-15 November 2011, Milan, Italy, p 60-67.

Sousa André, Fernandes Hugo, Faria José, Reis Arsénio, Gonçalves Ramiro, and Barroso João, “Personal Geolocation System,” Proceedings of the 14th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-3-8, 23- 24 June 2010, Istanbul, Turkey, p 2179-2182.

Vítor José Domingues Mendonça, João Eduardo Quintela Alves Sousa Varajão, and Paula Cristina Ribeiro Coutinho Oliveira, “Proposal of a Web Information System to Support Cooperation Networks: A Functional Architecture to Share Business Opportunities,” Proceedings of the 14th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-3-8, 23- 24 June 2010, Istanbul, Turkey, p 2480-2489.

Elisabete Paulo Morais, Sónia Sousa Santos, and Ramiro Moreira Gonçalves, “Electronic Business Maturity in Portuguese SME and Large Enterprises,” Proceedings of the 14th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-3-8, 23- 24 June 2010, Istanbul, Turkey, p 2506-2513.

José Cabral, Hugo Paredes, João Varajão, Benjamin Fonseca, Ramiro Gonçalves, and João Gonçalves, “CSCW and Information Systems Planning,” Proceedings of the 14th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-3-8, 23- 24 June 2010, Istanbul, Turkey, p 2748-2754.

Emanuel Peres, Nuno Liberato, Maximino Bessa, and João Varajão, “Events Promotion: an e-Business Solution,” Proceedings of the 13th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-2-1, 9-10 November 2009, Marrakech, Morocco, p 255-265.

Carlos R. Cunha, Emanuel Peres, Raul Morais, andManuel Cabral Reis, “The Inov@Douro cooperative network: shaping collaboration among Douro Region viticulture companies focusing tourism,” Proceedings of the 13th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-2-1, 9-10 November 2009, Marrakech, Morocco, p 271-283.

Ramiro Moreira Gonçalves, Sónia Sousa Santos, and Elisabete Paulo Morais, “E-business Maturity and Information Technology in Portuguese SMEs,” Proceedings of the 13th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-2-1, 9-10 November 2009, Marrakech, Morocco, p 318-324.

Ramiro Gonçalves, Anabela Fernandes, Jorge Pereira, and José Martins, “Portuguese Web Accessibility Indicators,” Proceedings of the 12th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN: 978-0-9821489-1-4, 29-30 June 2009, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, p 855-860.

Elisabete Paulo Morais, José Adriano Pires, and Ramiro Moreira Gonçalves, “Exploring the Constraints to the Evolution of Electronic Business: The Portuguese Reality,” Proceedings of the 11th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN : 978-0-9821489-0-7, 4- 6 January 2009, Cairo, Egypt, p 243-249.

Diana S. S. Santos, António M. J. Pereira, and Ramiro M. R. M. Gonçalves, “IntelligentCart: Architecture of an Innovative System for the Acquisition of Products in Grocery Stores,” Proceedings of the 11th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN : 978-0-9821489-0-7, 4- 6 January 2009, Cairo, Egypt, p 350-357.

António Trigo, João Varajão, Irene Oliveira, and João Barroso, “Chief Information Officer’s activities and skills in Portuguese large companies,” Proceedings of the 11th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN : 978-0-9821489-0-7, 4- 6 January 2009, Cairo, Egypt, p 510-516.

Márcia Filipa Lopes Catarino, Dulce Cristina dos Santos Iria Gonçalves, António Manuel de Jesus Pereira, João Eduardo Quintela Alves de Sousa Varajão, “Software Projects’ Most Important Activities of Quality Management: A Delphi Study,” Proceedings of the 11th International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA), ISBN : 978-0-9821489-0-7, 4- 6 January 2009, Cairo, Egypt, p 1680-1686.
